lgp.core.evolution.population

Class Models.SteadyState<TProgram>

  • EvolutionModel
    • lgp.core.evolution.population.Models.SteadyState<TProgram>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Enclosing class:
    Models

    public static class Models.SteadyState<TProgram>
extends EvolutionModel

    A model for evolution using a steady-state algorithm.

    For more information, see Algorithm 2.1 (LGP Algorithm) from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

      • train

        public EvolutionResult<TProgram> train(Dataset<? extends TProgram> dataset)

        Train the model on the given data set.

        A result is given which describes the process of evolution during training.

        Parameters:
        dataset - A set of features and target values.
